channel.title: Allrecipes Daily Recipes for Main Dish

item.title: Burgers: Grilled Hawaiian Chicken and Pineapple Sandwiches | Submitted By: VbCook
item.description: Marinated, grilled chicken is topped with grilled pineapple and cheese. It may sound a little strange, but it is very tasty!

item.title: Casserole Recipes: Thanksgiving Leftover Casserole | Submitted By: Sharon Pruitt
item.description: Turkey, mashed potatoes, cheese, a special sauce, and some little extras combine to make a tasty casserole for 'the day after'. Absolutely delicious way to use those tasty Thanksgiving leftovers.

item.title: Pizza Recipes: Veggie Pizza | Submitted By: SEDAVIS
item.description: Store-bought crescent roll dough with light cream cheese, light sour cream, and veggies makes a quick and easy light meal or snack. You can use whatever veggies you like best, and you can steam them lightly or leave them raw.

item.title: Sandwiches: Sloppy Joes II | Submitted By: Tamara
item.description: Ground beef, onion, green pepper, and ketchup are seasoned with garlic powder and sweetened with brown sugar to make this hearty meat filling. Serve on hamburger buns.

item.title: Quiche and Savory Pies: Spinach Pie V | Submitted By: WITCH
item.description: A rich cheese and spinach mixture is baked inside crisp, rolled pastry sheets. Easy to make, and looks fancy!

item.title: Slow Cooker Main Dishes: Easiest Pot Roast Ever | Submitted By: Jennifer Miles
item.description: This roast cooks with vegetables and beef bouillon for up to 8 hours in a slow cooker. Use some additional water if it is to cook that long.

item.title: Tacos, Burritos, and Enchiladas: Italian Tacos | Submitted By: Super Dave
item.description: Simple to make, a great twist on regular tacos. If you like Italian food, you'll certainly love these!

item.title: Meatless Main Dishes: Baingan Bharta (Eggplant Curry) | Submitted By: Yakuta
item.description: Enjoy this spicy Indian eggplant curry dish over rice or with Indian bread (or both).

item.title: Meatloaf Recipes: Ribbon Meatloaf | Submitted By: Maureen Worman
item.description: Beautifully mellow in flavor, this meatloaf has a ribbon of cheese flowing through the middle of it.

item.title: Steaks and Chops: Thai Pork with Peanut Sauce | Submitted By: JDOERINGPA
item.description: This is a very simple and quick dish that combines the standard pork chop with the wonderful flavor of coconut and peanuts. Even the kids loved it.

item.title: Roast: Maple Baked Pork Loin Roast | Submitted By: Janet P.
item.description: Here's a simple maple-flavored roast that will feed a crowd. It takes only 15 minutes to prepare, then slow roasts in the oven until it is fall-apart tender!

item.title: Stir Fry: Stir Fried Pasta with Veggies | Submitted By: JARRELL
item.description: Broccoli, cauliflower and carrots are added to a savory stir fry of garlic, onion and chicken, with dashes of soy sauce to season the mix. Serve over hot spaghetti.

item.title: Main Dish Salads: Squid Salad | Submitted By: Lola
item.description: Squid simmered in wine and tossed with a tangy vinaigrette. Perfect antipasti. Don't forget the crusty Italian bread and fruity extra virgin olive oil for dipping.

item.title: Ribs: Filipino Ribs | Submitted By: CHRISTYJ
item.description: Make a big batch of these ribs because they will disappear quickly! Ribs simmered in soy sauce, onions and star anise are finished with a baked-on glaze of honey, ginger, soy and Worcestershire sauce and a touch of lemon.

item.title: Deep Fried: Restaurant-Style Extra Crispy Chicken | Submitted By: Doreen
item.description: A whole fryer chicken, marinated and coated in egg, milk and seasoned flour, then fried until extra crispy! Reported to have the extra crispy chicken taste and texture of a famous restaurant chain chicken.

item.title: Stuffed Peppers: Stuffed Peppers with Turkey and Vegetables | Submitted By: LSMITHNY21
item.description: Turkey and a variety of vegetables make a great filling for stuffed green bell peppers.

item.title: Main Dish Fish and Shellfish: Baked Salmon I | Submitted By: SDELATORE
item.description: Baked salmon with herbs, orange juice, and brown rice. Great served with steamed broccoli and carrots.

item.title: Pesto Recipes: Cream of Tomato Soup with Pesto | Submitted By: DASKDS
item.description: Quick and creamy tomato soup with pesto. You can spice this up with hot sauce or chile oil if you like it hot.
